com.kunzisoft.androidclearchroma

Class ChromaPreferenceCompat

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.preference.Preference
      • android.support.v7.preference.DialogPreference
        • com.kunzisoft.androidclearchroma.ChromaPreferenceCompat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<android.support.v7.preference.Preference>

    public class ChromaPreferenceCompat
extends android.support.v7.preference.DialogPreference
    Compatibility DialogPreference class that handles preferences, selected color display, and dialog box for selecting this color.
